Description.Text: Zelenaya Roscha VIP is a friendly 3-star superior hotel offering modern accommodation south of Sochi. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a good location in Sochi National Park. Sochi National Park is a beautifully preserved space offering tranquillity and recreational opportunities. Nearby places of interest include Stalin's former summer residence Sochi-House Museum and a private beach. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a colourful facade. Facilities include a private beach, outdoor swimming pool and a spa with two saunas, a gym and a relaxation area. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a traditional style with floral fabrics. Rooms feature a balcony with sea, garden or mountain views. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, safe and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Dolce Vita restaurant serves Russian and European cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
